title: "empty_graph"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = ">"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(saferGraph)
```
<br>

### Argument text
```{r}
empty_graph(text = "No data available")

empty_graph()
```
<br>

### Argument text.size
```{r}
empty_graph(text = "No data available", text.size = 1.5)
empty_graph(text = "No data available", text.size = 1)
```
<br>

### Argument title
```{r}
empty_graph(title = "Empty Graph")
```
<br>

### Argument title.size
```{r}
empty_graph(title = "Empty Graph", title.size = 2)
empty_graph(title = "Empty Graph", title.size = 1.5)
```
<br>

### All the arguments
```{r}
empty_graph(text = "No data available", text.size = 1.5, title = "Empty Graph", title.size = 2)
```
